DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this placebo-controlled, 3-way crossover study is to determine the acute (24-h) bioavailability and pharmacokinetics of the major phytochemicals found whole barley and oats, as well as their effects on selected measures of antioxidation, inflammation, insulin sensitivity/glucose regulation, and vascular remodeling following challenge by an oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT).
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Assessment of Barley and Oat Phytochemicals
